titles.title: SHIPS Implementation Act
Securing the Homeland by Increasing our Power on the Seas Implementation Act
SHIPS Implementation Act
A bill to foster the implementation of the policy of the United States to achieve 355 battle force ships as soon as practicable.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Securing the Homeland by Increasing our Power on the Seas Implementation Act or SHIPS Implementation Act
This bill authorizes the U.S. Navy to procure specified amphibious ships, submarines, and fleet oilers.
